urls.title: Climate change is responsible for billions of dollars in flood costs, study says
urls.description: cbsnews.com New research analyzes the economic toll of 3 decades of U.S. flood damage and finds more than one-third of it is due to the warming climate.

text: @Drystonesonnet @PhilFarmVet @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency No sign of wildlife when i was there in 14. Scratching the boat bottom on hedges. Yes was fairly depressing but the pub cheered us up @kingalfred

@PhilFarmVet @Drystonesonnet @sunkfarmer @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency Trouble is all the building up stream, Taunton, Yeovil and surrounding areas all the water has to come down to us to get out to sea , the water used to take 24 hrs to get to us but now takes 12 hrs and a lot more of it

Have a Great & Safe Week Everyone 👍❤️👍

.@EnvAgencySE can anything be done about the regular flooding under the two bridges under the Slough to Windsor railway and the A355 road?

text: @PhilFarmVet @sunkfarmer @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency Indeed. Some bits (the Tor) occupied in the Mesolithic; Roman settlements in many places; Anglo Saxon drainage and so on. Alfred's burnt cakes. Fascinating place - and full of Reed Warblers when I last visited.

text:
@sunkfarmer @PhilFarmVet @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency Really? And you from Sunk Island....😳

I visited later in the early summer when dredging had just begun. It was very slow to start with and we were worried that EA were messing about. In the end they got it done OK and I don't think there has been a problem since.
@WildStoke @burge2u @SoTCityCouncil @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @SOTHour Chatterley Whitfield colliery. Fegg Hayes. https://t.co/W44nPw4h5c
RT @EnvAgencyNW: A planning application has been submitted for the first phase of the #Preston & South Ribble #Flood Risk Management Scheme…

@WildStoke @burge2u @SoTCityCouncil @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @SOTHour Chell heath & Fegg Hayes were always 'wild places' to grow up when I was A kid. We never had dummies   but Pigs trotters from James Butchers in Tunstall market. We also had beef dripping on coal fired toast in the mornings. Fantastic... NCB soap, towels and hobnail boots... 👍👏

@sunkfarmer @PhilFarmVet @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency Yes. New build should be directed away from flood plains. In any case, this is usually our most fertile land and should be used for food production.

https:/…
RT @WasteCrimeWatch: Says it all really. A policy of appeasement @EnvAgency. Anger mounts over 120,000 tonnes of illegally dumped waste  ht…

@PhilFarmVet @sunkfarmer @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency Thank you. That was all I wanted to know.

I agree that people live there and need to be protected from the flooding experienced in 2013(?) and that the only way of doing that was to dredge to some degree. The 'no-dredge' policy was a disaster.

@PhilFarmVet @Drystonesonnet @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency And the planning departments are stupid for dreaming up idiotic ideas that housing belongs on flood plains, they don't.
